text: Alloh ʙa ʙani Isroil megujad: Agar neki kuned, ʙa xud mekuned va agar ʙadi kuned, ʙa xud mekuned. Va cun va'dai duvvum faro rasid, kasonero ʙar saraton firistodem, to sumoro ʙo ozoru alam rasonidan ƣamgin sozand va cun ʙori avval, ki ʙa mascid daromada ʙudand, ʙa mascid darojand va ʙa har ci dast joʙand, noʙud sozand
